org.spongepowered.api.world.gen.populator

Interface Ore.Builder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResettableBuilder<Ore,Ore.Builder>
    Enclosing interface:
    Ore

    public static interface Ore.Builder
extends ResettableBuilder<Ore,Ore.Builder>
    A builder for constructing Ore populators.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ore build()
      Builds a new instance of a Ore populator with the settings set within the builder.
      Ore.Builder height(VariableAmount height)
      Sets the height that the ore can generate at.
      Ore.Builder ore(BlockState block)
      Sets the block to place as ore.
      default Ore.Builder perChunk(int count)
      Sets the number of ore clumps to attempt to spawn per chunk, must be greater than zero.
      Ore.Builder perChunk(VariableAmount count)
      Sets the number of ore clumps to attempt to spawn per chunk, must be greater than zero.
      Ore.Builder placementCondition(Predicate<BlockState> condition)
      Sets a predicate which checks for the placement conditions for this ore.
      default Ore.Builder size(int size)
      Sets the size of deposit of ore.
      Ore.Builder size(VariableAmount size)
      Sets the size of deposit of ore.

      • build

        Ore build()
   throws IllegalStateException
        Builds a new instance of a Ore populator with the settings set within the builder.
        Returns:
        A new instance of the populator
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If there are any settings left unset which do not have default values
